Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
Animate Guardian Nearby Enemies Take 9% Increased Elemental Damage Nearby Enemies Take 10% More Damage Minions have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier Minions Unnerve Enemies for 4 Seconds on Hit
Arena Master (averaged out dmg) Minions have 8% increased Cast Speed Minions Deal 8% Increased Damage
minions deal 27% increased damage
